hero_title: A Living Eco-Farm in South Lebanon
hero_desc: NUWA is a vibrant eco-farm rooted in the rich landscape of South Lebanon, where permaculture practices meet rural tourism. Designed as an integrated living system, NUWA regenerates the land through sustainable agriculture, water harvesting, and native planting.
faq1_a:
Homeowners (Rooftops, balconies, backyards, private gardens)
Restaurants & Cafés (Farm-to-table herbs, vegetables, fresh produce)
Schools & Institutions (Educational gardens and learning spaces)
Landowners / Developers (Agricultural plots, food forests, eco-farm zones)
faq2_a:
Step 1: Consultation — We discuss your space, needs, and goals (Online or on-site)
Step 2: Site Visit & Assessment — Sunlight, soil, water access, technical conditions
Step 3: Custom Design & Plan — Layout, plant selection, irrigation & full system
Step 4: Implementation — DIY or handled by our team
faq3_a:
Custom farm layout plan
Full planting strategy
Irrigation + compost + soil recommendations
Seasonal planting calendar
Materials list
Maintenance guidance
Optional follow-up and training
about_hero_title: An integrated eco-farm in South Lebanon, combining agriculture, water systems, native plants, and community spaces.
